amendment.description: Amendment prohibits acceptance or solicitation to obtain access to certain government property including Air Force One, Marine One, Air Force Two, Marine Two, the White House or the Vice President's residence.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit acceptance or soliciation to obtain access to Air Force One, Marine One, Air Force Two, Marine Two, the White House or the Vice President's residence and institutes a fine or imprisonment for violation for up to one year.

action.text: Amendment (A013) offered by Mr. McInnis to the Shays amendment (A002).
On agreeing to the McInnis amendment (A013) Agreed to by recorded vote: 391 - 7 (Roll No. 305).
